name: Pioneerz
description:
Live the life of a fantasy pioneer: Help your town to grow by protecting it and gathering resource. Explore the world, fight monsters and enemy towns.
But be careful, the world is living (Plants grow, animals reproduce, towns are expanding…)
And you never know which danger you will encounter (rabbit invasion, wandering trolls, underground scar…)

The road is harsh to make a peaceful empire!

Nb : Multiplayer needs at least a pad.
